channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: デジタル時代のNYTの改革に貢献し、ニュースルームの使命をよく理解しているマーク・トンプソンは、低迷するCNNにふさわしい。
item.description:
Margaret Sullivan / The Guardian:
Mark Thompson, who helped reinvent the NYT for the digital age while showing a solid understanding of the newsroom's mission, is a good bet for a beleagured CNN  —  As New York Times public editor, I worried about his time running the BBC  —  n late 2012, I was the newly minted public editor …

item.title: 英国出版者協会は、英国AI安全サミットを前に、「AIシステムによってあらゆるコンテンツが取り込まれる際、知的財産法が尊重される」よう政府に求める（Daniel Thomas/Financial Times）。
item.description:
Daniel Thomas / Financial Times:
The UK Publishers Association calls on the government to ensure IP law “be respected when any content is ingested by AI systems”, ahead of a UK AI Safety Summit  —  Trade body calls on prime minister to ensure developing technology is trained ‘transparently’

item.title: 電子書籍の著作権争いにおいて、著者たちは力を合わせて、電子書籍は紙の本と同じ条件で図書館に提供されなければならないと契約書に規定するよう要求すべきだ（Maria Bustillos/The Nation）
item.description:
Maria Bustillos / The Nation:
In the ebook copyright fight, authors should join forces to demand that contracts stipulate ebooks must be offered to libraries on the same terms as paper books  —  But corporate mega-publishers want purchasing a book to be like renting a movie or streaming an album.  —  Pocket

item.title: 米著作権局がAIと著作権の問題について意見募集、AI訓練への著作物利用など、意見書の提出期限は10月18日（Emilia David/The Verge）
item.description:
Emilia David / The Verge:
The US Copyright Office seeks public input on AI and copyright issues, including the use of copyrighted works to train AI; written comments are due October 18  —  The US Copyright Office is opening a public comment period around AI and copyright issues beginning August 30th as the agency figures out how to approach the subject.

item.title: ガネット、AIツール「レデAI」による高校スポーツ記事の執筆を一時停止 少なくとも1紙の記事で重大な欠陥があったため（Clare Duffy/CNN）
item.description:
Clare Duffy / CNN:
Gannett pauses the use of an AI tool, Lede AI, to write high school sports stories after several major flubs appeared in articles in at least one of its papers  —  New York CNN —  —  Newspaper chain Gannett has paused the use of an artificial intelligence tool to write high school sports dispatches …

item.title: 尾田栄一郎の漫画とアニメシリーズを原作とし、8月31日にスタートするNetflixの実写シリーズ『ONE PIECE』と、その前代未聞のマーケティング契約について（Jennifer Maas/Variety）
item.description:
Jennifer Maas / Variety:
A look at One Piece, the live-action Netflix series launching August 31 based on Eiichiro Oda's manga and anime series, and its unprecedented marketing deals  —  The breakout popularity of “Stranger Things” and “Wednesday” was a boon for Netflix execs, but also a lesson …

item.title: Stourbridge Investments社がディズニー社と複数の経営幹部を提訴、レガシー・プラットフォームにコストを転嫁することでDisney+の損失を隠蔽しようと画策したと主張（Dominic Patten/Deadline）
item.description:
Dominic Patten / Deadline:
Stourbridge Investments sues Disney and several top executives, claiming they schemed to hide Disney+ losses by shifting costs to the company's legacy platforms  —  - Ron Jeremy Accused Of “Heinous Sexual Acts” At Rainbow Bar & Grill; Sunset Strip Venue Hit With Negligence Suit Over Rapes By Porn Actor

item.title: 情報筋バーストゥール・スポーツは、ペン・エンタテインメントによるデイブ・ポートノイへの売却に伴い、従業員の約25％、約100人を解雇する（New York Post）。
item.description:
New York Post:
Sources: Barstool Sports is laying off nearly 25% of its employees, or around 100 jobs, following Penn Entertainment's sale of the outlet back to Dave Portnoy  —  Barstool Sports will lay off nearly 25 percent of its employees, which will result in around 100 lost jobs on Thursday, The Post has learned.

item.title: 情報筋フランスの大富豪François-Henri PinaultがTPGからCAA株の過半数を購入する70億ドルの取引に近づいている。
item.description:
Bloomberg:
Sources: French billionaire François-Henri Pinault is close to a $7B deal to buy a majority stake in CAA from TPG; Temasek may also increase its CAA stake  —  - Company's lineup runs from actor Brad Pitt to NBA's Chris Paul  — Singapore's Temasek is expected to increase its stake as well

item.title: ハリウッド・レポーター紙、ネケサ・ムンビ・ムーディ氏の後任としてメア・ロシャン氏を共同編集長に指名、2019年からロサンゼルス・マガジンのEICを務めるロシャン氏は9月25日から（The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
The Hollywood Reporter:
The Hollywood Reporter names Maer Roshan as co-editor-in-chief, joining Nekesa Mumbi Moody; Roshan, EIC of Los Angeles Magazine since 2019, starts September 25  —  Roshan joins the team Sept. 25 from Los Angeles Magazine, where he served as editor-in-chief since 2019.

item.title: 情報筋：ディズニー、アマゾン・スタジオ、ネットフリックス、ユニバーサル、WBDのトップが8月30日に会合を開く予定だったが、ディズニーのボブ・アイガー氏は出席しない予定だった（Deadline）。
item.description:
Deadline:
Sources: top executives from Disney, Amazon Studios, Netflix, Universal, and WBD planned to meet August 30; Disney's Bob Iger wasn't set to attend  —  EXCLUSIVE: Amid growing speculation of internal divisions within the C-suites and a lack of any apparent path forward to end the writers and actors strikes …

item.title: サウジアラビアの裁判所が、反体制派弾圧の一環として、Xへの投稿やYouTubeでの活動を理由に男性に死刑判決を下した。
item.description:
Jon Gambrell / Associated Press:
A Saudi court sentences a man to death over his X posts and YouTube activity, part of a growing dissent crackdown; his brother is a well-known government critic  —  A Saudi court has sentenced a man to death over his posts on X, formerly known as Twitter, and his activity on YouTube

item.title: OpenAI、著作権侵害を主張する書籍著者からの同様の2件の訴訟を却下する申し立てを提出、著者らは「著作権の範囲を誤解している」としている（Ashley Belanger/Ars Technica）
item.description:
Ashley Belanger / Ars Technica:
OpenAI files a motion to dismiss two similar lawsuits from book authors alleging copyright infringement, saying the authors “misconceive the scope of copyright”  —  Authors claim generative AI is just a “grift” that repackages original works.  —  This week, OpenAI finally responded …

item.title: NBCユニバーサル、グローバル広告・パートナーシップ担当の新会長にマーク・マーシャルを指名 長年重役を務めてきたリンダ・ヤッカリーノがXのCEOに就任するため退任（Axios）
item.description:
Axios:
NBCUniversal names Mark Marshall as its new chairman of global advertising and partnerships, after longtime executive Linda Yaccarino left to become X's CEO  —  Mark Marshall has been named chairman of global advertising and partnerships for NBCUniversal, the company said Wednesday …

item.title: フォックスビジネスのスチュアート・バーニー、ユニビジョンのイラ・カルダー、フォックス・ニュースのダナ・ペリーノが、9月27日に行われる第2回共和党大統領予備選討論会の司会を務める予定。
item.description:
Stephen Battaglio / Los Angeles Times:
Fox Business' Stuart Varney, Univision's Illa Calderón, and Fox News' Dana Perino plan to moderate the second GOP presidential primary debate on September 27  —  Fox Business Network will carry the next Republican presidential primary debate, but the channel's longtime star anchor Maria Bartiromo won't be a part of it.
